mdRecord.dcterms:title: New sectional map of the eastern & southern portion of the state of Florida / issued by the Land Department of the Florida Southern Railway Co., showing the lands owned & offered for sale by said department ; the Orange Belt route, its branches & connections ; 4.000.000 acres of land for sale .. ; W.P. Couper, Land Commissioner, Florida Southern Railway Company, Palatka, Florida, 1887
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Florida Southern Railway Co. Land Department.
Matthews-Northrup Company.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 80 x 51 cm., on sheet 82 x 53 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Coverage includes all of Florida except the panhandle.
Includes explanations of the sectioning and the coloring systems, and has text "for full descriptive notes see back of this map." The back of the map, however, is blank.
Prime meridians: Greenwich and Washington, D.C.
Inset: untitled map of the rail and steamboat routes of the Florida Southern Railway Co.
Advertisement inset, with illustration, of the Hotel Punta Gorda.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Very fragile, with many large tears.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Florida Southern Railway Co.--Maps.
Real property--Florida--Maps.
Railroads--Florida--Maps.
Steamboat lines--Florida--Maps.
Florida--Maps.
